description: A test helper Dart file providing functions to initialize the test environment with environment variables, secure storage mock setup, and widget builders with provider contexts for Flutter testing.

methods.name: initializeTestEnvironment
methods.description: Initializes Flutter test environment, loads environment variables from a string, and sets up mock secure storage to prevent plugin exceptions.

methods.name: buildTestWidget
methods.description: Creates a widget wrapped with provider context, primarily for testing widgets with authentication state and material design structure.

methods.name: buildTestWidgetWithRouter
methods.description: Creates a widget with provider context and optional routing, for navigation testing within widget tests.
